alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 12:13AM CDT until July 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seminole County in east central Oklahoma... Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1213 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Tecumseh to 4 miles northwest of St. Louis to 3 miles southwest of Asher, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Seminole, Tecumseh, Wewoka, Konawa, Maud, Earlsboro, Bowlegs, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Johnson, St. Louis, Sasakwa, Brooksville, Macomb, Little, Bethel Acres, Lima, and Harjo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
